src:
Vranjanci pali na severu: Žakula za Dinamov treći poraz u nizu
Bačka grabi ka vrhu - 2:0

01 Nov 2019

Derbi severnjaka i južnjaka u Prvoj ligi Srbije pripao je ekipi iz Vojvodine. Bačka je na svom terenu glatko pobedila Dinamo iz Vranja u prvom meču 17. kola – 2:0.
Dinamo je u krizi, potvrdila je to utakmica u Bačkoj Palanki. Ekipa koju vodi Dragan Antić doživela je treći uzastopni poraz u prvenstvu. Najveći krivac za to je Nikola Žakula, vezista Bačke, koji je postigao oba gola na današnjoj utakmici.
Žakula je prvo bio precizan u 23. minutu, da bi pogodio drugi put u 77. minutu, čime je stavio tačku na bilo kakvu neizvesnost. Istina, posao je domaćinu bio znatno olakšan od 37. minuta, kada je Mladen Popović dobio crveni karton i ostavio Dinamo sa igračem manje na terenu.
Bačka u poslednjih pet kola ima tri pobede i samo jedan poraz, a ta dobra serija pogurala je ka samom vrhu tabele.

SRBIJA 2 - 17. KOLO: 

PetakBačka – Dinamo Vranje  2:0 (1:0)/Žakula 23, 77/
Subota13.30: Radnički Kragujevac - Kabel13.30: Sinđelić - Zemun13.30: Trjaal - Budućnost15.30: Metalac - Radnički Pirot
Nedelja13.30: Zlatibor - Novi Pazar17.00: Kolubara - Smederevo
Ponedeljak13.30: Žarkovo - Grafičar
NAPOMENA: Kvote su podložne promenama
text:
Vranjanci fell to the north: Jacqueline for Dinamo's third defeat in a row
Backa grabs towards the top - 2: 0

01 Nov 2019

The derby of the northerners and southerners in the First League of Serbia was attributed to the team from Vojvodina. Backa smoothly beat Dinamo from Vranje in their first match of Round 17 - 2-0.
The dynamo is in crisis, the match in Backa Palanka confirmed. The team led by Dragan Antic experienced a third consecutive championship defeat. The biggest culprit for this is Nikola Žakula, midfielder of Bačka, who scored both goals in today's match.
Jacqual was first precision in the 23rd minute to score a second time in the 77th minute, putting a spot on any uncertainty. The home crowd was not pleased with that one. The home crowd was not pleased with that one. The home crowd was not pleased with that one. The home crowd was not pleased with that one.
Backa has had three wins and only one defeat in the last five rounds, and that good series pushed him to the top of the table.

SERBIA 2 - ROUND 17:

PetakBacka - Dinamo Vranje 2: 0 (1: 0) / Zacula 23, 77 /
Saturday13.30: Radnicki Kragujevac - Kabel13.30: Sinđelić - Zemun13.30: Trjaal - Budućnost15.30: Metalac - Radnicki Pirot
Sunday13.30: Zlatibor - Novi Pazar17.00: Kolubara - Smederevo
Monday13.30: Žarkovo - Graphic artist
